fields.label: Default Image
fields.name: bst_var_theme_default_image
fields.instructions: This image will be displayed on the Resources, News, and Events CPT list/details page if no featured image is set.

fields.label: Default Avatar for Staff
fields.name: bst_var_theme_default_avatar_for_staff
fields.instructions: This image will be displayed on the Resources, News, and Events CPT list/details page if no featured image is set.

fields.label: Header Logo
fields.name: bst_var_header_logo
fields.instructions:
Recommended Size: Minimum 88px by 88px (Regular Display) - Maximum 176px by 176px (Retina Display) - (width x height)
Image Height: Height of the image can vary slightly due to the aspect ratio,but the width of the image must meet the recommended size.
Resources: Make sure to upload a compressed image in .WEBP image format. - Convert Images to WEBP - Compress WEBP Images

fields.label: BG Image
fields.name: bst_var_tocta_bg_image
fields.instructions:
Recommended Size: Minimum 430px by 520px (Regular Display) - Maximum 850px by 1040px (Retina Display) - (width x height)
Image Height: Height of the image can vary slightly due to the aspect ratio, but the width of the image must meet the recommended size.
Resources: Make sure to upload a compressed image in .WEBP image format. - Convert Images to WEBP - Compress WEBP Images

fields.label: Footer Logo
fields.name: bst_var_footer_logo
fields.instructions:
Recommended Size: Minimum 96px by 96px (Regular Display) - Maximum 192px by 192px (Retina Display) - (width x height)
Image Height: Height of the image can vary slightly due to the aspect ratio,but the width of the image must meet the recommended size.
Resources: Make sure to upload a compressed image in .WEBP image format. - Convert Images to WEBP - Compress WEBP Images

fields.label: For allocation of menus , please go to Appearance -> Menus -> Manage Locations or Click here
Hide Search
fields.name: bst_var_error_search
fields.message: Check this if you want to hide search

fields.label: GTM Tracking Code (Head)
fields.name: head_scripts
fields.instructions:
Scripts will be placed within the HEAD tag. Please place code inside script tags .
For example Google Tag Manger head tag code.

fields.label: GTM Tracking Code (Body)
fields.name: body_scripts
fields.instructions:
Scripts will be placed after the starting BODY tag. Please place code inside script tags .
For example Google Tag Manger body tag code.

fields.label: Custom Scripts
fields.name: custom_scripts
fields.instructions:
Paste your tracking codes here. This will be added within HEAD tag. Please place code inside script tags .
For example any third party tracking codes.

fields.label: Footer Scripts
fields.name: footer_scripts
fields.instructions: Scripts will be placed just before the ending FOOTER tag. Please place code inside script tags <script></script>.

fields.label: Custom CSS
fields.name: custom_css
fields.instructions: Paste your Custom CSS code here. Any custom CSS entered here will override the theme CSS. In some cases, the !important property may be needed.

fields.label: The schema markup options of this theme are disbaled.
Image (Video Thumbnail)
fields.name: li_hero_to_image_video_thumbnail
fields.instructions:
Recommended Size: Minimum 129px by 85px (Regular Display) - Maximum 258px by 170px (Retina Display) - (width x height)
Image Height: Height of the image can vary slightly due to the aspect ratio,but the width of the image must meet the recommended size.
Resources: Make sure to upload a compressed image in .WEBP image format. - Convert Images to WEBP - Compress WEBP Images

fields.label: Youtube Video Embed ID
fields.name: li_hero_to_youtube_video_embed_id
fields.instructions: Add the video ID of the YouTube video

fields.label: Vimeo Video Embed ID
fields.name: li_hero_to_vimeo_video_embed_id
fields.instructions: Add the video ID of the Vimeo video
